get_db[source]

get_db()

Connect to the application's configured database. The connection is unique for each request and will be reused if this is called again.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

close_db[source]

close_db(exception=None)

If this request connected to the database, close the connection.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

init_db[source]

init_db()

Clear existing data and create new tables.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

[source]

(*args, **kwargs)

Clear existing data and create new tables.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

init_app[source]

init_app(app)

Register database functions with the Flask app. This is called by the application factory.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
with test_resources() as app:
    db = get_db()
    assert db == get_db()
    cursor = db.cursor()
    cursor.execute("SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type='table'")
    assert [] == cursor.fetchall()
    init_db()
    cursor.execute("SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type='table' AND NAME NOT LIKE 'sql%'")
    assert ['post','user'] == sorted([r[0] for r in cursor.fetchall()])
